jd: From: Raj, Softcom Systems Inc raj@softcomsystems.com Reply to: raj@softcomsystems.com Position 1 : Rate $65/hr on C2C Position: Java LeadLocation: Brentwood, TN (Day 1 onsite)Duration: Contract Job DescriptionHands on experience with REST and SOAP web services development using core Java J2EEHandson experience with Amazon Web Services AWSKnowledge of Spring Framework and HibernateExperience with web application standards and technologies like Spring Batch Spring Boot XML XSD XSLT WSDL and JAXBExposure to one or more of the following application servers Tomcat JBoss and WebLogicExperience with SQL and relational databases Experience working on DB like Oracle DB2 PostgreSQL and SQL ServerExposure with the following build and deployment tools Ant Maven JenkinsExposure with source control tools e g Subversion GIT SVNIn addition to the Java back end experience a comfort with Angular 4 or above and Bootstrap is a plusExposure with Atlassian tools Jira ConfluenceNeed experience in production issue handlingExcellent team collaboration and communication skills as well as analysis and problem solving skillA great attitude personal desire drive to produce amazing workFlexible in timingCan work under multi vendor environment. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Position 2 : Rate $45/hr on C2C Position: Java DeveloperLocation: Scottsdale, AZ (Onsite)Duration: Contract Mandatory Skills:JAVA , Spring Boot, Microservices , ReactPreferred Exp Azure PlatformExperience in JDBC Design and Architecture in Enterprise SolutionAbility to work in large, collaborative teams to achieve team & organizational goals.Should have can-do attitude, strong analytical skills, be a problem solver and a self-starterPrior experience in large scale healthcare initiatives preferred but not mandatory.
